function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited evaluation and assessment of building automation and control systems bacs design and operation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Outdated bacs in healthcare buildings in denmark","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Minimal consideration and evaluation of bacs design and operation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Evaluation and assessment of building automation and control systems could lead to design flaws that impact building performance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for contamination in shared ventilation systems","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring and control of building automation systems","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive assessment of building domains for disease transmission risks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of auditing and design evaluation of bacs in smart buildings leading to large energy performance gaps and suboptimal control systems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of hygiene and sanitation in healthcare facilities","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality and thermal comfort in healthcare facilities","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient building automation and control system","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor hygiene and sanitation practices","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overcrowding in indoor spaces","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Multiple parameters comprising the iaq category, leading to non-compliance if one parameter exceeds the relevant threshold.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assessment of thermal comfort, lighting, and iaq compliance only during occupied hours 8am -6pm , and acoustic compliance during unoccupied hours 7pm -7am after the air conditioning system has started.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Samba device unaware of its location, with data packets assigned to a \n’zone’ based on instructions established within the dashboard.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Occupant density fluctuations throughout the working day","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overwhelming background noise level in contemporary sealed-façade office buildings","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Innovation in pervasive sensor technologies and wireless communication protocols.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in office buildings due to close proximity of occupants.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of national or international guidelines for hcho and tvoc parameters","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exclusion of weekends and public holidays from compliance metrics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ambiguity in occupancy during ’fringe’ hours 7-8am and 7-8pm","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Real-time updates and dynamic content may encourage user interaction but also increase the risk of contagious disease propagation if the dashboard is accessed by infected individuals.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited availability of historical data through the dashboard may hinder comprehensive analysis of building performance, including the tracking of long-term trends and patterns in indoor environmental quality.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Automatic generation and distribution of weekly reports may lead to complacency among users in conducting their own detailed follow-up diagnostics, potentially overlooking critical issues in indoor environmental quality.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of data quality and accuracy due to complex sensing environments and variances in indoor environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of inadequate data representation and insight generation from ieq measurements","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ad-hoc wireless network may interfere with host building’s existing services or information/communication networks.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on wireless mesh network for data relay may result in data transmission delays or interruptions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of native python environment for processing sensor data and additional computing tasks may pose security vulnerabilities.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spurious measurements in the data stream","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unreliable data transmission due to wpan collapse","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contamination of samba with contagious diseases","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Samba firmware warming up period of 10 minutes may lead to delays in accessing sensor data, impacting real-time monitoring and response","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate error checking and data processing in ’calibration’ mode may result in inaccurate or incomplete measurements, impacting the accuracy of disease propagation monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Buffering measurements without sufficient quality assurance may lead to the inclusion of erroneous data in the analysis, impacting the accuracy of disease propagation monitoring","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proprietary firmware for xbee module may pose security risks and vulnerabilities to the network.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Internationalisation of power supply may introduce compatibility issues and safety risks.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Plug-and-play installation may lead to overlooking safety and environmental factors.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Switching system architecture from arduino avr to arm cortex","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of inexpensive but accurate and readily available devices for high performance building applications","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Selection of sensor parameters based on nabers indoor environment rating scheme","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enclosed array of sensors may compromise indoor air quality","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Off-gassing of chemical compounds from housing materials","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intrusion of technology into immediate workspace","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of contamination if the sensor network is not properly sanitized or maintained, leading to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex ebbs and flows of air temperature and relative humidity within office buildings","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented insight into commercial office building ieq performance through environmental monitoring and building operations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Highly localised environmental sensors capable of monitoring individual occupant exposure","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"}]}
